item.title: Adding Gameplay Verbs and Goals
item.description: Because most games are made of other games, they typically have multiple goals running at the same time.

item.title: Adding a Mechanical Statistic
item.description: Extending an existing statistic fails to present the player with a to challenge or tool and is generally regarded as a boring and tedious addition to a given system.

item.title: Agenda Card
item.description: This is the core of my system.

item.title: Agent
item.description: A discrete process of intentional actualization oriented towards a distinct Telos.

item.title: Antinet Zettlekasten
item.description: The “Antinet” is a term coined by author and copywriter Scott Scheper to describe his version of Niklas Luhmmann’s Zettlekasten system.

item.title: Arguments
item.description: “A reason or set of reasons given with the aim of persuading others that an action or idea is right or wrong.” New Oxford American Dictionary In Analytical Reading, the key sentences in individual paragraphs in a well constructed book will form the basis of an author’s arguments.

item.title: Astrology
item.description: Planets Hellenistic Astrology by Chris Brennan.
